title: Identified Merit with PaperSelectTMInterview
format: Employces re solicited to give their feedback at a table set up across from the cafeteria.
intent: THE INTENT IS TO INTERVIEW ANY ADULT SMOKER WHO HAS TRIED OR CURRENTLY SMOKES THE MERIT WITH PAPERSELECT TM
questions: What is the brand you currently smoke?
Have you ever tried the Merit with PaperSelect TM?
eligibility: Only smokers 21 years of age or older are eligible to participate in this research
requirements: Accordingly, we are requiring that you provide us a valid, non-expired government-issued ID as proof of age for our examination. If you do not have such a government issued ID or if you do not sign this registration form, you will NOT be eligible to participate in this research.
